title: Chalice Cover, 17th century
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Design consists of a figure of a bishop, surrounded by floral scrolls terminating in angel heads at each of the four corners. Border is comprised of stylized floral forms. Pattern connected by brides, outlined by cordonnet, interspersed by portes.

tombstone.epitaph:
Chalice Cover, 17th century.
17th century. Medium: linen
Technique: needle lace. Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf. 1962-50-32.
